blocks.content: Define the binary bits of an integer. The expression ` M e. ( bits `` N ) ` means that the ` M ` -th bit of ` N ` is 1 (and its negation means the bit is 0). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cz, cbits, crab(s0, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))))), crab(s0, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))))))
  rabbidv(s0, cn0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))))), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))))
  breq2d(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cfl, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))
  df-bits(hs0, s0)
  rabex(s0, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))))))
  nn0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
}

} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cfv(cbits, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cn0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))))))
  biadanii(wcel(c0, cfv(cbits, c1)), wcel(c1, cz), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))))
  mptrcl(hs0, c0, cbits, c1, cz, crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))))))
  df-bits(hs0, hs1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cbits, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))), wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cbits, c1), crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c1, cz))
  bitsfval(hs1, c1)
  elrab(hs1, c0, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))))), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)))))
  breq2d(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))), cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq2d(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))), co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2d(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)), co(nat2, cexp, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, nat2, cexp)
  3anass(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cn0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)

blocks.name: bitsf
blocks.content: The ` bits ` function is a function from integers to subsets of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm bitsf() {
  |- wf(cbits, cz, cpw(cn0))
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, cbits, cz, cpw(cn0), crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))))))
  df-bits(hs0, hs1)
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))))), cpw(cn0)))
  elpwi2(crab(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1))))))), cn0, universe)
  nn0ex()
  ssrab2(hs1, cn0, wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cn0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bitsf() {
  ⊢ (bits : ℤ → P(ℕ0))
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, cbits, cz, P(ℕ0), { hs1 ∈ ℕ0 | ¬ 2[||](⌊ `(hs0[÷](2[^]hs1)))})
  df-bits(hs0, hs1)
  a1i(hs0 ∈ ℤ, { hs1 ∈ ℕ0 | ¬ 2[||](⌊ `(hs0[÷](2[^]hs1)))} ∈ P(ℕ0))
  elpwi2({ hs1 ∈ ℕ0 | ¬ 2[||](⌊ `(hs0[÷](2[^]hs1)))}, cn0, universe)
  nn0ex()
  ssrab2(hs1, cn0, ¬ 2[||](⌊ `(hs0[÷](2[^]hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℕ0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
}

  syl5eq(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, nat0)), c0, co(c0, cdiv, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq2i(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, nat0), nat1)

thm bitsp1(class c0, class c1) {

  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))), wbr(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))))
  breq2d(nat2, cdvds, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(cfl, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(cfl, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  fveq2d(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))

  eqtrd(co(nat2, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(nat2, cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)), co(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cmul, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  expp1d(nat2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  mulcomd(co(nat2, cexp, c1), nat2, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  divdiv1d(c0, nat2, co(nat2, cexp, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  zcnd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))

  nncnd(co(nat2, cexp, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nnne0d(nat2, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nnne0d(co(nat2, cexp, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, c1), cn))
  nnexpcld(nat2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()

blocks.name: bitsfzo
blocks.content: The bits of a number are all less than ` M ` iff the number is nonnegative and less than ` 2 ^ M ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: bitsmod
blocks.content: Truncating the bit sequence after some ` M ` is equivalent to reducing the argument ` mod 2 ^ M ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: bitsfi
blocks.content: Every number is associated with a finite set of bits. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm bitsfi(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cfv(cbits, c0), cfn))

  nn0re(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat1, clt, nat2))
  1lt2()
  expnbnd(hs0, c0, nat2)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(cbits, c0), cfn), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs0)), cfn), wss(cfv(cbits, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs0))))
  fzofi(nat0, cv(hs0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wss(cfv(cbits, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0)), cz), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0), cn0, wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))))

  elfzo2(c0, nat0, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wbr(c0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wb(wcel(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wss(cfv(cbits, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))

blocks.name: bitscmp
blocks.content: The bit complement of ` N ` is ` -u N - 1 ` . (Thus, by ~ bitsfi , all negative numbers have cofinite ` bits ` representations.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: bitsinv1
blocks.content: There is an explicit inverse to the ` bits ` function for nonnegative integers (which can be extended to negative integers using ~ bitscmp ), part 1. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: bitsinv2
blocks.content: There is an explicit inverse to the ` bits ` function for nonnegative integers, part 2. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: bitsf1ocnv
blocks.content: The ` bits ` function restricted to nonnegative integers is a bijection from the integers to the finite sets of integers. It is in fact the inverse of the Ackermann bijection ~ ackbijnn . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: bitsf1o
blocks.content: The ` bits ` function restricted to nonnegative integers is a bijection from the integers to the finite sets of integers. It is in fact the inverse of the Ackermann bijection ~ ackbijnn . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: bitsf1
blocks.content: The ` bits ` function is an injection from ` ZZ ` to ` ~P NN0 ` . It is obviously not a bijection (by Cantor's theorem ~ canth2 ), and in fact its range is the set of finite and cofinite subsets of ` NN0 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm bitsf1() {
  |- wf1(cbits, cz, cpw(cn0))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf1(cbits, cz, cpw(cn0)), wf(cbits, cz, cpw(cn0)), wral(hs0, cz, wral(hs1, cz, wi(wceq(cfv(cbits, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbits, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  bitsf()
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cz, wi(wceq(cfv(cbits, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbits, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  mpjaodan(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wi(wceq(cfv(cbits, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbits, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cneg(cneg(cv(hs0))), cn0))
  expr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cz)), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cn), wceq(cfv(cbits, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbits, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: sadadd2lem2
blocks.content: The core of the proof of ~ sadadd2 . The intuitive justification for this is that ` cadd ` is true if at least two arguments are true, and ` hadd ` is true if an odd number of arguments are true, so altogether the result is ` n x. A ` where ` n ` is the number of true arguments, which is equivalently obtained by adding together one ` A ` for each true argument, on the right side. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sadcf
blocks.content: The carry sequence is a sequence of elements of ` 2o ` encoding a "sequence of wffs". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)

thm sadcf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, c2o)), wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0)))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, c2o)), diffsc(s1, c1))

  eqeltri(cfv(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), nat0), c2o, emptycls)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), nat0), emptycls), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  fvmpt(s2, nat0, cn0, cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), emptycls, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))

  eqid(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2o), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cv(hs1)), c2o))
  eqeltri(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cv(hs1)), c2o, cfv(cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  df-ov(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cv(hs1))

  prid2(c1o, emptycls)
  1oex()
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0)))), c2o, cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))))
  eleqtrri(emptycls, c2o, cpr(emptycls, c1o))
  prid1(emptycls, c1o)
  0ex()
  df2o3()
  nn0uz()
  0zd(w0)
  fvexd(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)))))
  feq1i(c0, cn0, c2o, cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2o)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(nat0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c2o)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cn0.s(s2)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)

  diff.cn0.s(s0)

  mpbi(((s0 ∈ 2o, s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(cadd(s1 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2, ∅ ∈ s0), 1o, ∅)):(2o × ℕ0)→ 2o), ∀(s0 ∈ 2o, ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0, if(cadd(s1 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2, ∅ ∈ s0), 1o, ∅)∈ 2o)))

  eqid(seq(0((hs1 ∈ 2o, hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(cadd(hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ hs1), 1o, ∅)),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1))))))
  ssrab2(hs0, cn0, hadd(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈(seq(0((hs1 ∈ 2o, hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(cadd(hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ hs1), 1o, ∅)),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1)))))` hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)

thm saddisjlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csad, c2)), wcel(c0, cun(c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c3, cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(emptycls, cv(s0))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, csad, c2)), wcel(c0, cun(c1, c2)), whad(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0))), wxo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
  sadval(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(whad(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0))), wxo(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0))))
  mpcom(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0)))), wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, nat0)))), wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))), wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, nat0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, nat0)))
  eleq2d(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  eleq2d(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, c0)))
  eleq2d(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  sadc0(s0, s1, s2, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))

blocks.name: saddisj
blocks.content: The sum of disjoint sequences is the union of the sequences. (In this case, there are no carried bits.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm saddisj(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, csad, c1), cun(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, csad, c1), cun(c0, c1), w0)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, csad, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  sseld(cv(hs0), co(c0, csad, c1), cn0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, csad, c1), cn0), wss(c0, cn0), wss(c1, cn0))
  sadcl(c0, c1)
  sseld(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cn0, w0)
  unssd(c0, c1, cn0, w0)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, csad, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1))))
  saddisjlem(hs1, hs2, hs3, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cseq(nat0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(emptycls, cv(hs1))))), cmpt(hs3, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(hs3), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs3), nat0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wss(c0, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wss(c1, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wceq(cin(c0, c1), emptycls))
  eqid(cseq(nat0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c2o, cn0, cif(c1o, emptycls, wcad(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(emptycls, cv(hs1))))), cmpt(hs3, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(hs3), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs3), nat0)))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, csad, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm saddisj(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[sadd]c1)=(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[sadd]c1), (c0 ⋃ c1), w0)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[sadd]c1), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  sseld(hs0, (c0[sadd]c1), cn0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[sadd]c1)⊆ ℕ0, c0 ⊆ ℕ0, c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  sadcl(c0, c1)
  sseld(hs0, (c0 ⋃ c1), cn0, w0)
  unssd(c0, c1, cn0, w0)
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (hs0 ∈(c0[sadd]c1)↔ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)))
  saddisjlem(hs1, hs2, hs3, hs0, c0, c1, seq(0((hs1 ∈ 2o, hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(cadd(hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ hs1), 1o, ∅)),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1))))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  eqid(seq(0((hs1 ∈ 2o, hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(cadd(hs2 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ hs1), 1o, ∅)),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1))))))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[sadd]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋃ c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: sadadd
blocks.content: For sequences that correspond to valid integers, the adder sequence function produces the sequence for the sum. This is effectively a proof of the correctness of the ripple carry adder, implemented with logic gates corresponding to ~ df-had and ~ df-cad . It is interesting to consider in what sense the ` sadd ` function can be said to be "adding" things outside the range of the ` bits ` function, that is, when adding sequences that are not eventually constant and so do not denote any integer. The correct interpretation is that the sequences are representations of 2-adic integers, which have a natural ring structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: sadid1

blocks.name: bitsres
blocks.content: Restrict the bits of a number to an upper integer set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm bitsres(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cin(cfv(cbits, c0), cfv(cuz, c1)), cfv(cbits, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, c1))), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, c1)))))

blocks.name: bitsuz
blocks.content: The bits of a number are all at least ` N ` iff the number is divisible by ` 2 ^ N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2016.)

blocks.name: df-smu
blocks.content: Define the multiplication of two bit sequences, using repeated sequence addition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-smu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(csmu, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cpw(cn0), crab(s2, cn0, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cseq(nat0, cmpo(s3, s4, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s3), csad, crab(s5, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s4), cv(s0)), wcel(co(cv(s5), cmin, cv(s4)), cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s5, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s5), nat0)))), co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-smu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ smul =(s0 ∈ P(ℕ0), s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)↦ { s2 ∈ ℕ0 | s2 ∈(seq(0((s3 ∈ P(ℕ0), s4 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s3[sadd]{ s5 ∈ ℕ0 |(s4 ∈ s0 ∧(s5[-]s4)∈ s1)})),(s5 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s5 = 0, ∅,(s5[-]1)))))`(s2[+]1))})
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)

}

thm smufval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[smul]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))})
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ c2 = seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[smul]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))}), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[smul]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))}), d(s0, w0))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[smul]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))}), d(s3, w0))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[smul]c1)= { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))}, c0 ∈ P(ℕ0), c1 ∈ P(ℕ0))
  sylibr(w0, c0 ∈ P(ℕ0), c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  elpw2(c0, cn0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 ∈ P(ℕ0), c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  elpw2(c1, cn0)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, P(ℕ0), c1, P(ℕ0), csmu, { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))}, { s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1)))))`(s0[+]1))})
  rabbidv(s0, cn0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), s0 ∈(seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1)))))`(s0[+]1)), s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1)))
  eleq2d(s0, (seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1)))))`(s0[+]1)), (c2 `(s0[+]1)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  fveq1d(seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1))))), (s0[+]1), c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  syl6eqr(seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1))))), c2, seq(0((s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1)})),(s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1))))), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  seqeq2d(nat0, (s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)})), (s3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s3 = 0, ∅,(s3[-]1))), (s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1)})), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  mpt2eq3dva(s1, s2, P(ℕ0), cn0, (s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)}), (s1[sadd]{ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1)}), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  oveq2d(s1, csad, { s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1)}, { s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1)}, ((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0))
  rabbidv(s3, cn0, ((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0), (s2 ∈ hs0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ hs1), (s2 ∈ c0 ∧(s3[-]s2)∈ c1))
  anbi12d(((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0), s2 ∈ hs0, (s3[-]s2)∈ hs1, s2 ∈ c0, (s3[-]s2)∈ c1)
  eleq2d(s2, hs0, c0, ((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0))
  simp1l(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0)
  eleq2d((s3[-]s2), hs1, c1, ((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ s1 ∈ P(ℕ0)∧ s2 ∈ ℕ0))
  simp1r(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0)
  df-smu(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  rabex(s0, cn0, s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1)))
  nn0ex()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℕ0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))})
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(P(ℕ0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ∈ ℕ0 | s0 ∈(c2 `(s0[+]1))})
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.w3a.s(s3, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), s1 ∈ P(ℕ0), s2 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wa.s(s3, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s1, P(ℕ0))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)

thm smupf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cn0))
  -| wceq(c0, cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), wi(w0, wss(c2, cn0)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  sylibr(w0, wf(c0, cn0, cpw(cn0)), wf(cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))), cn0, cpw(cn0)))
  seqf2(hs0, hs1, nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), cn0, cpw(cn0), universe, w0)
  syl6eqel(cfv(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), nat0), cpw(cn0), emptycls, w0)
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), nat0), emptycls), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  fvmpt(s2, nat0, cn0, cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))), emptycls, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))
  iftrue(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))
  eqid(cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0))))
  0ex()
  a1i(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cn0)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cv(hs1)), cpw(cn0)))

blocks.name: smuval
blocks.content: Define the addition of two bit sequences, using ~ df-had and ~ df-cad bit operations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm smuval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cn0))
  -| wceq(c3, cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cn0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))))
  eleq2d(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2), crab(hs0, cn0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), w0)
  smufval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cn0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  elrab3(hs0, c0, cn0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3, caddc, nat1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smuval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈(c1[smul]c2)↔ c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ c3 = seq(0((s0 ∈ P(ℕ0), s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s0[sadd]{ s2 ∈ ℕ0 |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧(s2[-]s1)∈ c2)})),(s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s2 = 0, ∅,(s2[-]1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈(c1[smul]c2)↔ c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1)))), d(s2, c0))
  bitrd(w0, c0 ∈(c1[smul]c2), c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1)), c0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ ℕ0 | hs0 ∈(c3 `(hs0[+]1))})
  eleq2d(c0, (c1[smul]c2), { hs0 ∈ ℕ0 | hs0 ∈(c3 `(hs0[+]1))}, w0)
  smufval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ ℕ0 | hs0 ∈(c3 `(hs0[+]1))} ↔ c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1))), c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  elrab3(hs0, c0, cn0, hs0 ∈(c3 `(hs0[+]1)), c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1)))
  eleq12d(hs0, (c3 `(hs0[+]1)), c0, (c3 `(c0[+]1)), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  fvoveq1(hs0, c0, c3, caddc, nat1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(c3 `(c0[+]1)))
}

blocks.name: smuval2
blocks.content: The partial sum sequence stabilizes at ` N ` after the ` N + 1 ` -th element of the sequence; this stable value is the value of the sequence multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm smuval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cn0))
  -| wceq(c3, cseq(nat0, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s0), csad, crab(s2, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmin, cv(s1)), c2))))), cmpt(s2, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s2), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s2), nat0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, c4))), wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  uzind4i(hs0, hs1, c4, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, c4)))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))), wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, csmu, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))

  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))

}

blocks.name: smupvallem
blocks.content: If ` A ` only has elements less than ` N ` , then all elements of the partial sum sequence past ` N ` already equal the final value. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2016.)

thm smupvallem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)=(c2[smul]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ⊣ c0 = seq(0((s0 ∈ P(ℕ0), s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s0[sadd]{ s2 ∈ ℕ0 |(s1 ∈ c2 ∧(s2[-]s1)∈ c3)})),(s2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(s2 = 0, ∅,(s2[-]1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(0[..^]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0 ` c1), (c2[smul]c3), w0)
  pm5.21ndd(w0, hs0 ∈(c0 ` c1), hs0 ∈(c2[smul]c3), hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  sseld(hs0, (c0 ` c1), cn0, w0)
  elpwid((c0 ` c1), cn0, w0)
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, P(ℕ0), cn0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ∈ ℕ0, c4 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  eluznn0(c4, c1)
  sseld(hs0, (c2[smul]c3), cn0, w0)
  syl6eqss((c2[smul]c3), cn0, { hs0 ∈ ℕ0 | hs0 ∈(c0 `(hs0[+]1))}, w0)
  smufval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  ssrab2(hs0, cn0, hs0 ∈(c0 `(hs0[+]1)))
  ex(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (hs0 ∈(c0 ` c1)↔ hs0 ∈(c2[smul]c3)))
  mpjaodan((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), (hs0 ∈(c0 ` c1)↔ hs0 ∈(c2[smul]c3)), c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)), (hs0[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  bicomd(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0)∧ c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1))), hs0 ∈(c0 ` c1), hs0 ∈(c2[smul]c3))
  smuval2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c2, c3, c0, c1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0)∧ c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)), c2 ⊆ ℕ0)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)), c3 ⊆ ℕ0)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)))
  sylan((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0), c4 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)), c1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs0[+]1)), c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))

thm smucl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cn0), wss(c1, cn0)), wss(co(c0, csmu, c1), cn0))

  smufval(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, cseq(nat0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(hs1), csad, crab(hs3, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs3), cmin, cv(hs2)), c1))))), cmpt(hs3, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(hs3), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs3), nat0)))), wa(wss(c0, cn0), wss(c1, cn0)))
  simpl(wss(c0, cn0), wss(c1, cn0))
  simpr(wss(c0, cn0), wss(c1, cn0))
  eqid(cseq(nat0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(hs1), csad, crab(hs3, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs3), cmin, cv(hs2)), c1))))), cmpt(hs3, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(hs3), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs3), nat0)))))
  ssrab2(hs0, cn0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cseq(nat0, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(hs1), csad, crab(hs3, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs3), cmin, cv(hs2)), c1))))), cmpt(hs3, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(hs3), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs3), nat0)))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  simpl(c0 ⊆ ℕ0, c1 ⊆ ℕ0)

  eqid(seq(0((hs1 ∈ P(ℕ0), hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(hs1[sadd]{ hs3 ∈ ℕ0 |(hs2 ∈ c0 ∧(hs3[-]hs2)∈ c1)})),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1))))))
  ssrab2(hs0, cn0, hs0 ∈(seq(0((hs1 ∈ P(ℕ0), hs2 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(hs1[sadd]{ hs3 ∈ ℕ0 |(hs2 ∈ c0 ∧(hs3[-]hs2)∈ c1)})),(hs3 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ if(hs3 = 0, ∅,(hs3[-]1)))))`(hs0[+]1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: smu01
blocks.content: Multiplication of a sequence by ` 0 ` on the right. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm smu01(class c0) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cn0), wceq(co(c0, csmu, emptycls), emptycls))
} = {
  smu01lem(hs0, hs1, c0, emptycls, wss(c0, cn0))
  id(wss(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wss(c0, cn0), wss(emptycls, cn0))
  0ss(cn0)
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs0)), emptycls))))
  intnan(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  noel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, cn0))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(c0, cn0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm smu01(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ℕ0 →(c0[smul]∅)= ∅)
} = {
  smu01lem(hs0, hs1, c0, emptycls, c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  id(c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  a1i(c0 ⊆ ℕ0, ∅ ⊆ ℕ0)
  0ss(cn0)
  a1i((c0 ⊆ ℕ0 ∧(hs0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ0)), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs1[-]hs0)∈ ∅))
  intnan(hs0 ∈ c0, (hs1[-]hs0)∈ ∅)
  noel((hs1[-]hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ⊆ ℕ0)
}

blocks.name: smu02

blocks.origin:
thm smu02(class c0) {

} = {

  a1i(wss(c0, cn0), wss(emptycls, cn0))
  0ss(cn0)
  id(wss(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cn0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  intnanr(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs0)), c0))
  noel(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm smu02(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ℕ0 →(∅[smul]c0)= ∅)

  0ss(cn0)

  intnanr(hs0 ∈ ∅, (hs1[-]hs0)∈ c0)

blocks.name: smueqlem
blocks.content: Any element of a sequence multiplication only depends on the values of the argument sequences up to and including that point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2016.)

  eqrdv(hs0, cin(co(c0, csmu, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), cin(co(cin(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), csmu, cin(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), w0)

  pm5.32rd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, csmu, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), csmu, cin(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, csmu, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)), csmu, cin(c1, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))))))

blocks.name: smumul
blocks.content: For sequences that correspond to valid integers, the sequence multiplication function produces the sequence for the product. This is effectively a proof of the correctness of the multiplication process, implemented in terms of logic gates for ~ df-sad , whose correctness is verified in ~ sadadd . Outside this range, the sequences cannot be representing integers, but the ` smul ` function still "works". This extended function is best interpreted in terms of the ring structure of the 2-adic integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
